name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: trendup - AI copilot for influencer marketing

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate your influencer marketing with trendup

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension lets you view detailed TikTok creator stats right on their profile, such as average views, fair deal estimates, and video view forecasts. It also automates sending DMs and emails, and helps craft effective partnership pitches, making it easier to manage creators and influencers.
